1: How blessed is every one of the Lord's loyal followers,[c] each one who keeps his commands.[d]
2: You[e] will eat what you worked so hard to grow.[f] You will be blessed and secure.[g]
3: Your wife will be like a fruitful vine[h] in the inner rooms of your house; your children[i] will be like olive branches, as they sit all around your table.
4: Yes indeed, the man who fears the Lord will be blessed in this way.[j]
5: May the Lord bless you[k] from Zion, that you might see[l] Jerusalem prosper all the days of your life,
6: and that you might see[m] your grandchildren.[n] May Israel experience peace.[o]
